snippet: There is still no agreement to let N.H.L. players participate in the 2014 Olympics, but Commissioner Gary Bettman is confident one will be made.
abstract: There is still no agreement to let NHL players participate in the 2014 Olympics, but commissioner Gary Bettman is confident one will be made.
lead_paragraph: There is still no agreement to let N.H.L. players participate in the 2014 Olympics, but Commissioner Gary Bettman is confident one will be made.

headline.main: N.H.L. Is Close to Making Olympic Deal
headline.print_headline: N.H.L. Is Close to Making Olympic Deal
